description.full: Single Player, Xbox Live Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Can you save the planet? Take on the invasion in DEFENDERâ„¢ and blast the alien abductors into oblivion to save the world! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Destroy all ALIENS! Rediscover the arcade classic shooter DEFENDER on Xbox Live. Save the planet by blasting the alien invaders before they can abduct or mutate the inhabitants on the surface.
